super_effective.default: It's SUPER effective! That fish isn't having a good time!
super_effective.christian_edition: It's super effective! The attack was very powerful.

not_effective.default: It's not very effective... Maybe try a different fish?
not_effective.christian_edition: It's not very effective. The attack did little damage.

critical_hit.default: A CRITICAL hit! BOOM! That's gonna leave a mark!
critical_hit.christian_edition: A critical hit! The attack was especially powerful.

miss.default: The attack MISSED! Aim isn't everything, but it helps!
miss.christian_edition: The attack missed! Better luck next time.

fish_fainted.default: {fish_name} has FAINTED! F in the chat for our fallen friend.
fish_fainted.christian_edition: {fish_name} has fainted and can no longer battle.

level_up.default: {name} grew to level {level}! LEVEL UP! Stats increased! Much wow!
level_up.christian_edition: {name} grew to level {level}! Stats have increased.

evolution.christian_edition: What? {fish_name} is evolving into a more powerful form!

no_pp.default: {move_name} has no PP left! Out of juice! Time for a different move!
no_pp.christian_edition: {move_name} cannot be used. No power points remaining.

fled.default: Got away SAFELY! Discretion is the better part of valor! Run away!
fled.christian_edition: You escaped safely from the battle.

cant_flee.default: Can't escape! You're stuck here! Fight or... well, just fight!
cant_flee.christian_edition: Cannot escape from this battle. You must fight.

battle_won.default: VICTORY! You won! Your fish are looking pretty smug about it.
battle_won.christian_edition: Victory! You have won the battle.

xp_gained.default: Gained {xp} XP! That sweet, sweet experience!

item_found.default: Found {item}! Free stuff! The best kind of stuff!

party_wiped.default: You BLACKED OUT! All your fish fainted! This is fine. Everything is fine.
party_wiped.christian_edition: All your fish have fainted. You must return to the last inn.

game_over.default: GAME OVER. But hey, you tried! Press any key to continue.
game_over.christian_edition: Game Over. Would you like to continue from your last save?

poisoned.default: {name} is POISONED! Taking damage each turn! Not ideal!
poisoned.christian_edition: {name} is poisoned and will take damage each turn.

burned.default: {name} is BURNED! Ouch! Hot hot hot!
burned.christian_edition: {name} is burned and will take damage each turn.

frozen.default: {name} is FROZEN solid! Can't move! Let it go! ...Sorry.

paralyzed.default: {name} is PARALYZED! Might not be able to move! Risky!
paralyzed.christian_edition: {name} is paralyzed and may be unable to act.

confused.default: {name} is CONFUSED! Might hurt itself in confusion! Classic!
confused.christian_edition: {name} is confused and may hurt itself instead of attacking.

asleep.default: {name} is ASLEEP! Zzz... Wake up! Nope, still sleeping.

blessed.default: {name} is BLESSED! Stats boosted! Divine power activated!
blessed.christian_edition: {name} is blessed and all stats have increased.

cursed.default: {name} is CURSED! Stats lowered! This is not good!
cursed.christian_edition: {name} is cursed and all stats have decreased.

save_success.default: Game SAVED! Your progress is safe! Don't worry, we got you!

save_failed.default: Save FAILED! Oh no! Try again? Please?
save_failed.christian_edition: Failed to save game. Please try again.

load_success.default: Game LOADED! Welcome back! Right where you left off!

load_failed.default: Load FAILED! No save file found! Start a new game?
load_failed.christian_edition: Failed to load game. No save file found.

metadata.description: All system and battle messages with dual-text support
